column18: 04/22/2009: On Wednesday in Maseru, Maseru, Lesotho, unknown gunmen, during a robbery of the Makoanyane Army base, abducted five military officers. According to a statement, by a Lesotho government official,  the officers were taken in order to facilitate a later attack, targeting the prime minister's residence. No group claimed responsibility.
column64: The specific motive for the attack is unknown.
column97: It is unknown if weapons were used in the attack.
column108: It is unknown if the attack caused any property damage.
column127: \"\"RSA Army Detains Seven Involved in Lesotho PM Assassination Attempt"
